title: What Happened to Mr Jenkins
description: This gripping short story is guaranteed to keep you thinking about what happened to Mr Jenkins long after you have finished reading. Set in a school in England in 1980. Martin, the protagonist, recalls his days there and when he had his first blackout. A moment in life is wiped leaving him with no recollection of what happened within that time frame. The second in a series of free shorts story ebooks by Rob Powell.
author: Rob Powell
